sentences.en: The department is reviewing its policy with regard to immunization.
sentences.cn: 该部门正在重新审查其有关免疫注射的政策。

sentences.en: Immunization coverage against fatal diseases has increased to 99% in some countries.
sentences.cn: 在一些国家致命疾病免疫注射的覆盖面已达到99%。

sentences.en: Further immunization campaigns will be conducted later in the year.
sentences.cn: 今年晚些时候将开展进一步的免疫运动。
